# Role Onboarding Checklist

Use this checklist when onboarding a new team member into a project role.

---

## Role Overview
- [ ] Review role definition and responsibilities in [OctoAcme Roles and Personas](../octoacme-roles-and-personas.md)
- [ ] Understand decision authority and escalation paths
- [ ] Review hand-off acceptance criteria for the role

---

## Stakeholders & Contacts
- [ ] Identify key stakeholders and their contact information
- [ ] Schedule introductory meetings with primary collaborators
- [ ] Join relevant communication channels (Slack, Teams, etc.)
- [ ] Add contacts to role-specific distribution lists

---

## Key Meetings
- [ ] Daily standup (time, location, cadence)
- [ ] Weekly planning or sync meetings
- [ ] Sprint ceremonies (planning, review, retrospective)
- [ ] Role-specific review sessions (change control, compliance reviews, QA sign-offs, etc.)
- [ ] Monthly stakeholder updates or steering committee meetings

---

## Owned Artifacts
- [ ] Review templates for deliverables owned by this role
- [ ] Understand artifact naming conventions and storage locations
- [ ] Identify current status of in-flight artifacts
- [ ] Review archive or historical artifacts for reference

---

## Access & Tools
- [ ] Request access to project management tools (Jira, GitHub Projects, etc.)
- [ ] Obtain necessary system access and credentials
- [ ] Set up required development or testing environments (if applicable)
- [ ] Access to document repositories and knowledge bases
- [ ] Access to dashboards, logs, or reporting tools

---

## Initial 30-60-90 Day Goals

### 30 Days
- [ ] Complete role overview and onboarding checklist
- [ ] Attend all key meetings and meet primary stakeholders
- [ ] Shadow current role owner (if transitioning)
- [ ] Review past deliverables and understand current project status

### 60 Days
- [ ] Take ownership of at least one deliverable or process
- [ ] Participate actively in role-specific activities
- [ ] Identify one improvement or optimization opportunity
- [ ] Build working relationships with key collaborators

### 90 Days
- [ ] Full ownership of role responsibilities
- [ ] Deliver complete artifact cycle (e.g., change request, QA cycle, compliance review)
- [ ] Provide feedback on role documentation or process improvements
- [ ] Mentor or support other team members in role-related activities

---

## Handover Notes
- [ ] Review handover notes from previous role owner (if applicable)
- [ ] Document open items, pending decisions, or in-flight work
- [ ] Clarify any ambiguities or questions with outgoing role owner
- [ ] Establish regular check-ins during transition period

---

## Completion Sign-off
- **Onboardee:** _______________________ Date: ___________
- **Manager/Lead:** _______________________ Date: ___________
